divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were watching the NHL 2012 Winter Classic on television.During the break between the second and third periods,the band "The Roots" were performing.During their performance we noticed an unusual light streak behind the left field seating area, into an opening between those seats and the large video screen,and accelerate away.This light changed directions multiple times.I've never witnessed any man made aircraft do what this light did and am perplexed as to what it may have been.I attached a You Tube link where the video can be watched.The light appears @ the 1:23 mark.
Summary: While watching NHL 2012 Winter Classic on television, my son and I noticed a streaking light fly into,then out of picture frame.
